Vidiyum Munn

Movie

  • Release Date: 29 Nov 2013
  • Genre(s): Thriller, Drama
  • Language(s): தமிழ்
  • Director(s): Balaji K. Kumar
  • Cast(s): Pooja Umashankar, Lakshmi Ramakrishnan, John Vijay, Amarendran Ramanan, Muthukumar See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 2h 19min
  • Music: Girishh Gopalakrishnan,Vijay Rathinam
  • Award(s): Ananda Vikatan Cinema 2014 (Won)
    Filmfare - Tamil Film Industry 2014 (Nominated) Awards List
  • Similar To: Pichaikkaran 2, Ratsasan
  • Story:
    Greed, lust and anger collide and threaten to rip apart the lives of two disparate women on the run to seek refuge. Vidiyum Munn explores the darker side of life and the emotional imbalance it can create in the hearts of those who succumb to it.
    Full Story
7.5/10

Vidiyum Munn - Where to Stream?

Yay! The movie is available for streaming online and you can stream Vidiyum Munn movie on Prime Video, Vi Movies and TV, Viu, Lionsgate Play, Aha. It is not available to buy online on any platforms right now. You can also rent the movie Vidiyum Munn on Prime Video starting from Rs 79.

STORY AND RATINGS

Story
Greed, lust and anger collide and threaten to rip apart the lives of two disparate women on the run to seek refuge. Vidiyum Munn explores the darker side of life and the emotional imbalance it can create in the hearts of those who succumb to it.
Ratings

7.5/10

IMDb

AWARDS

Won
Ananda Vikatan Cinema Award

Best Actress | 2014 | Pooja

Nominations
Filmfare - Tamil Film Industry Award

Best Actress | 2014 | Pooja

SIIMA - Tamil Award

Best Actress in a Leading Role | 2014 | Pooja

Best Child Actor | 2014 | Malavika

Jury Award

Best Actress | 2014 | Pooja

TRIVIA

Trivia

Balaji K Kumar took 6 weeks to write the script in English and more than a year to transcribe the same in Tamil.

Naan Kadavul released in the year 2009 was the last film by Pooja in Tamil. In the next few years she became a very popular actor in Srilankan Film Industry. After three years she decided to act in Vidiyum Munn since the story and screenplay impressed her a lot.

First feature film to be produced by Khayum Studios.

4th Indian Film to be released in Auro 3D 11.1 sound.
